name: Cere Network
description: Cere Network is the first Decentralized Data Cloud (DDC) platform built on Substrate and Polygon. Cere is the first Web3 project that facilitates trustless cloud data storage, integration and data collaboration across blockchain networks as well as Web3 NFT, metaverse and gaming content. Cere is backed by the worldâ€™s largest institutions and projects, such as Binance Labs, Republic Labs and Polygon.
